short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces mentions of the 45th president of the United States with a more appropriate title

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sick of seeing the names of hateful bigots plastered over the otherwise lovely sites you visit?  
Tired of having to address a certain someone by their reluctantly bestowed title?
Looking for an extension that puts more funny words onto your screen?
Wowee, do we have a solution for you!

Untrumped aims to alleviate some of those ill feelings induced by the sight of our 45th Presidents name, replacing all instances of it with a much more... fitting... name.
